Package deco2800.thomas.worlds

Class AbstractWorld

java.lang.Object
deco2800.thomas.worlds.AbstractWorld
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoadGameWorld, ServerWorld, TestWorld
public abstract class AbstractWorld
extends java.lang.Object
AbstractWorld is the Game AbstractWorld It provides storage for the WorldEntities and other universal world level items.
